content.text:
# President of the Congress of the Republic of Peru

| insignia =
| insigniacaption = Parliamentary Logo
| image = REUNIÓN CON EL CONGRESISTA FERNANDO ROSPIGLIOSI CAPURRO (cropped).jpg
| incumbent = Fernando RospigliosiActing
| incumbentsince = 10 October 2025
| residence = Legislative Palace
| seat = Lima
| termlength = 1 year, renewable
| inaugural = Francisco Xavier de Luna Pizarro
| formation = 20 September 1822
| succession = Third
| deputy = 1st Vice President of Congress2nd Vice President of Congress3rd Vice President of Congress
| website = [http://www.congreso.gob.pe/presidencia/ congreso.gob.pe]
}}
President of the Congress of the Republic of Peru is the presiding officer in the Congress of the Republic of Peru.
This is a list of representatives that have served as Presidents of the Peruvian legislature. The Constitution of 1993 re-arranged Congress into a unicameral legislature. The President is elected for a one-year term.
